name: PolySweeper3D
description:
Sit back and relax as you play a new take on an old classic!

PolySweeper3D is a soothing remake of the hit game Minesweeper. With four unique tile sets, 20 different ultra-chill songs unique to each theme, and the most satisfying tile pops ever, you're bound to have a great time!

 Play with a friend!

PolySweeper3D has a rudimentary cooperative mode! You and three of your mates can squad-up to play a round together. Work together to break a new team records, or bicker about who set off a bomb! Just don't forget to be safe and have fun.

Host:
  • Port forward a port on your router ( ex. 25580 )
  • Then in game, select your level settings and click on "Play Online"
  • Click on "Host"
  • Enter the port that you have forward
  • Give your TRUSTED friend your IP to join
Join:
  • Have a friend host a round.
  • Click on "Play Game" and choose a theme (it can be different than the host)
  • Click on "Play Online" and then "Join"
  • Then enter your friends IP address ( ex. 127.0.0.1:25580)
  • Finally click "Join Game"
Steam ReleaseIf you would like to see PolySweeper3D on Steam, please consider donating a buck or two!
